name: Jiaxin Ding 0001
content: Jiaxin Ding Search Jiaxin Ding Tenure-Track Associate Professor Shanghai Jiao Tong University Biography Hi, I’m Jiaxin Ding. I am currently a tenure-track associate professor in the John Hopcroft Center for Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I received Ph.D. degree from Computer Science, Stony Brook University in 2018, under the advisory of Prof. Jie Gao and B.S. degree from Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University in 2012. I worked as a postdoc researcher with Prof. Xin Liu in Computer Science, University of California, Davis, from Jan. 2019 to Dec. 2019. Perspective Students I am always looking for self-motivated students who are interested in pursuing master’s or Ph.D. degrees in the areas of Structure-aware Learning, Reinforcement Learning, and Privacy Protection. Please feel free to send me an email if you are interested. Group Members Ph.D.: Fan Xu, Shiqing Gao, Yule Xie, Yijun Zhang, Zhuo Wang Master: Haochen Han, Sibo Zhang, Xin Ding, Haoxiang Zhang Master Alumni: Shichuan Xi (Business Analyst, Huatai Securities), Jiaqi Zhai (Algorithm Engineer, Kuaishou), Bowen Zhang (Algorithm Engineer, Baidu), Kailong Wu (Software Engineer, Shanghai Shantai Information Technology) Interests Structure-aware Learning Reinforcement Learning Privacy Protection Education Ph.D. in Computer Science, 2012-2018 Stony Brook University B.S. in Artificial Intelligence, 2008-2012 Peking University B.A. in Economics(double major), 2009-2012 Peking University Publications Shiqing Gao, Yihang Zhou, Shuai Shao, Haoyu Luo, Yiheng Bing, Jiaxin Ding, Luoyi Fu, Xinbing Wang, âExtreme Value Policy Optimization for Safe Reinforcement Learningâ, International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML), 2025.
